title: CLOSEMATE Mens Crew Socks Cotton Cushioned Moisture Wicking Sport Socks Breathable Training Athletic Socks 6 Pairs
description: Premium Material: The mid calf crew socks are made of 85% combed cotton, 12% polyester, and 3% spandex, keeping your feet comfortable and dry throughout the day. Suitable for US Size M(6-9), Size L(9-12) and Size XL(12-15).

Long-Lasting Crew Socks: The terry sole on high-wear areas provides extra comfort and impact absorption while walking. The reinforced heel and toe enhance durability and abrasion resistance, prolonging the lifespan of the socks.

Ergonomic Sock Design: The flat seam design reduces friction between the foot and sock, while the sock's arch design allows for a better fit. These ergonomic design features make the socks highly comfortable.
Ideal for Indoor & Outdoor: These sports socks with high elastic cuff provide a comfortable fit that is neither too tight nor too loose. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor activities.

We are Committed to Improving Customer Satisfaction: Each package contains 6 pairs of crew socks. If you encounter any problems, please do not hesitate to contact us. We will always try our best to solve any issues and ensure your satisfaction.
